00035 // This forward declaration is required for the friend declaration
00036 // in iterator_core_access
00037 template<typename I, typename V, typename CT, typename R, typename P, typename D> class iterator_facade;
00038 
00039 class iterator_core_access
00040 {
00041     // declare our friends
00042     template<typename I, typename V, typename CT, typename R, typename P, typename D> friend class iterator_facade;
00043 
00044     // iterator comparisons are our friends
00045     template <class Dr1, class V1, class TC1, class R1, class P1, class D1,
00046               class Dr2, class V2, class TC2, class R2, class P2, class D2>
00047     friend bool
00048     operator ==(iterator_facade<Dr1,V1,TC1,R1,P1,D1> const& lhs,
00049                 iterator_facade<Dr2,V2,TC2,R2,P2,D2> const& rhs);
00050 
00051     template <class Dr1, class V1, class TC1, class R1, class P1, class D1,
00052               class Dr2, class V2, class TC2, class R2, class P2, class D2>
00053     friend bool
00054     operator !=(iterator_facade<Dr1,V1,TC1,R1,P1,D1> const& lhs,
00055                 iterator_facade<Dr2,V2,TC2,R2,P2,D2> const& rhs);
00056 
00057     template <class Dr1, class V1, class TC1, class R1, class P1, class D1,
00058               class Dr2, class V2, class TC2, class R2, class P2, class D2>
00059     friend bool
00060     operator <(iterator_facade<Dr1,V1,TC1,R1,P1,D1> const& lhs,
00061                iterator_facade<Dr2,V2,TC2,R2,P2,D2> const& rhs);

00064               class Dr2, class V2, class TC2, class R2, class P2, class D2>

00070               class Dr2, class V2, class TC2, class R2, class P2, class D2>

00081     // iterator difference is our friend
00082     template <class Dr1, class V1, class TC1, class R1, class P1, class D1,
00083               class Dr2, class V2, class TC2, class R2, class P2, class D2>
00084     friend typename iterator_facade<Dr1,V1,TC1,R1,P1,D1>::difference_type
00085     operator-(iterator_facade<Dr1,V1,TC1,R1,P1,D1> const& lhs,
00086               iterator_facade<Dr2,V2,TC2,R2,P2,D2> const& rhs);

00088     template<typename Facade>
00089     __host__ __device__
00090     static typename Facade::reference dereference(Facade const& f)
00091     {
00092       return f.dereference();
00093     }
00094 
00095     template<typename Facade>
00096     __host__ __device__
00097     static void increment(Facade& f)
00098     {
00099       f.increment();
00100     }
00101 
00102     template<typename Facade>
00103     __host__ __device__
00104     static void decrement(Facade& f)
00105     {
00106       f.decrement();
00107     }

00110     __host__ __device__
00111     static bool equal(Facade1 const& f1, Facade2 const& f2)
00112     {
00113       return f1.equal(f2);
00114     }

00153     template <class Facade1, class Facade2>
00154     __host__ __device__
00155     static typename Facade2::difference_type distance_from(Facade1 const& f1, Facade2 const& f2)
00156     {
00157       return f2.distance_to(f1);
00158     }

00160     //
00161     // Curiously Recurring Template interface.
00162     //
00163     template <class I, class V, class TC, class R, class P, class D>
00164     __host__ __device__
00165     static I& derived(iterator_facade<I,V,TC,R,P,D>& facade)
00166     {
00167       return *static_cast<I*>(&facade);
00168     }
00169 
00170     template <class I, class V, class TC, class R, class P, class D>
00171     __host__ __device__
00172     static I const& derived(iterator_facade<I,V,TC,R,P,D> const& facade)
00173     {
00174       return *static_cast<I const*>(&facade);
00175     }

00182 
00183 template<typename Derived,
00184          typename Value,
00185          typename CategoryOrTraversal,
00186          typename Reference,
00187          typename Pointer,
00188          typename Difference>
00189   class iterator_facade
00190 {
00191   private:
00192     // XXX move these somewhere else
00193     template<typename T>
00194       struct remove_const
00195     {
00196       typedef T type;
00197     }; // end remove_const
00198     
00199     template<typename T>
00200       struct remove_const<const T>
00201     {
00202       typedef T type;
00203     }; // end remove_const
00204 
00205     //
00206     // Curiously Recurring Template interface.
00207     //
00208     Derived& derived()
00209     {
00210       return *static_cast<Derived*>(this);
00211     }
00212 
00213     Derived const& derived() const
00214     {
00215       return *static_cast<Derived const*>(this);
00216     }
00217 
00218   public:
00219     typedef typename remove_const<Value>::type value_type;
00220     typedef Reference                         reference;
00221     typedef Pointer                           pointer;
00222     typedef Difference                        difference_type;
00223 
00224     // XXX investigate whether or not we need to go to the lengths
00225     //     boost does to determine this type
00226     typedef CategoryOrTraversal               iterator_category;
00227 
00228     __host__ __device__
00229     reference operator*() const
00230     {
00231       return iterator_core_access::dereference(this->derived());
00232     }
00233 
00234     // XXX investigate whether or not we need to go to the lengths
00235     //     boost does to determine the return type
00236     __host__ __device__
00237     pointer operator->() const
00238     {
00239       return this->derived();
00240     }
00241 
00242     // XXX investigate whether or not we need to go to the lengths
00243     //     boost does to determine the return type
00244     __host__ __device__
00245     reference operator[](difference_type n) const
00246     {
00247       return *(this->derived() + n);
00248     }
00249 
00250     __host__ __device__
00251     Derived& operator++()
00252     {
00253       iterator_core_access::increment(this->derived());
00254       return this->derived();
00255     }
00256 
00257     __host__ __device__
00258     Derived  operator++(int)
00259     {
00260       Derived tmp(this->derived());
00261       ++*this;
00262       return tmp;
00263     }
00264 
00265     __host__ __device__
00266     Derived& operator--()
00267     {
00268       iterator_core_access::decrement(this->derived());
00269       return this->derived();
00270     }
00271 
00272     __host__ __device__
00273     Derived  operator--(int)
00274     {
00275       Derived tmp(this->derived());
00276       --*this;
00277       return tmp;
00278     }
00279 
00280     __host__ __device__
00281     Derived& operator+=(difference_type n)
00282     {
00283       iterator_core_access::advance(this->derived(), n);
00284       return this->derived();
00285     }
00286 
00287     __host__ __device__
00288     Derived& operator-=(difference_type n)
00289     {
00290       iterator_core_access::advance(this->derived(), -n);
00291       return this->derived();
00292     }
00293 
00294     __host__ __device__
00295     Derived  operator-(difference_type n) const
00296     {
00297       Derived result(this->derived());
00298       return result -= n;
00299     }
00300 
00301   protected:
00302     typedef iterator_facade iterator_facade_;
00303 
00304 }; // end iterator_facade

00306 // Comparison operators
00307 template <class Dr1, class V1, class TC1, class R1, class P1, class D1,
00308           class Dr2, class V2, class TC2, class R2, class P2, class D2>
00309 inline __host__ __device__
00310 // XXX it might be nice to implement this at some point
00311 //typename enable_if_interoperable<Dr1,Dr2,bool>::type // exposition
00312 bool
00313 operator ==(iterator_facade<Dr1,V1,TC1,R1,P1,D1> const& lhs,
00314             iterator_facade<Dr2,V2,TC2,R2,P2,D2> const& rhs)
00315 {
00316   return iterator_core_access
00317     ::equal(*static_cast<Dr1 const*>(&lhs),
00318             *static_cast<Dr2 const*>(&rhs));
00319 }
00320 
00321 template <class Dr1, class V1, class TC1, class R1, class P1, class D1,
00322           class Dr2, class V2, class TC2, class R2, class P2, class D2>
00323 inline __host__ __device__
00324 // XXX it might be nice to implement this at some point
00325 //typename enable_if_interoperable<Dr1,Dr2,bool>::type // exposition
00326 bool
00327 operator !=(iterator_facade<Dr1,V1,TC1,R1,P1,D1> const& lhs,
00328             iterator_facade<Dr2,V2,TC2,R2,P2,D2> const& rhs)
00329 {
00330   return !iterator_core_access
00331     ::equal(*static_cast<Dr1 const*>(&lhs),
00332             *static_cast<Dr2 const*>(&rhs));
00333 }
00334 
00335 template <class Dr1, class V1, class TC1, class R1, class P1, class D1,
00336           class Dr2, class V2, class TC2, class R2, class P2, class D2>
00337 inline __host__ __device__
00338 // XXX it might be nice to implement this at some point
00339 //typename enable_if_interoperable<Dr1,Dr2,bool>::type // exposition
00340 bool
00341 operator <(iterator_facade<Dr1,V1,TC1,R1,P1,D1> const& lhs,
00342            iterator_facade<Dr2,V2,TC2,R2,P2,D2> const& rhs)
00343 {
00344   return 0 > iterator_core_access
00345     ::distance_from(*static_cast<Dr1 const*>(&lhs),
00346                     *static_cast<Dr2 const*>(&rhs));
00347 }
00348 
00349 template <class Dr1, class V1, class TC1, class R1, class P1, class D1,
00350           class Dr2, class V2, class TC2, class R2, class P2, class D2>
00351 inline __host__ __device__
00352 // XXX it might be nice to implement this at some point
00353 //typename enable_if_interoperable<Dr1,Dr2,bool>::type // exposition
00354 bool
00355 operator >(iterator_facade<Dr1,V1,TC1,R1,P1,D1> const& lhs,
00356            iterator_facade<Dr2,V2,TC2,R2,P2,D2> const& rhs)
00357 {
00358   return 0 < iterator_core_access
00359     ::distance_from(*static_cast<Dr1 const*>(&lhs),
00360                     *static_cast<Dr2 const*>(&rhs));
00361 }
00362 
00363 template <class Dr1, class V1, class TC1, class R1, class P1, class D1,
00364           class Dr2, class V2, class TC2, class R2, class P2, class D2>
00365 inline __host__ __device__
00366 // XXX it might be nice to implement this at some point
00367 //typename enable_if_interoperable<Dr1,Dr2,bool>::type // exposition
00368 bool
00369 operator <=(iterator_facade<Dr1,V1,TC1,R1,P1,D1> const& lhs,
00370             iterator_facade<Dr2,V2,TC2,R2,P2,D2> const& rhs)
00371 {
00372   return 0 >= iterator_core_access
00373     ::distance_from(*static_cast<Dr1 const*>(&lhs),
00374                     *static_cast<Dr2 const*>(&rhs));
00375 }

00377 template <class Dr1, class V1, class TC1, class R1, class P1, class D1,
00378           class Dr2, class V2, class TC2, class R2, class P2, class D2>
00379 inline __host__ __device__
00380 // XXX it might be nice to implement this at some point
00381 //typename enable_if_interoperable<Dr1,Dr2,bool>::type // exposition
00382 bool
00383 operator >=(iterator_facade<Dr1,V1,TC1,R1,P1,D1> const& lhs,
00384             iterator_facade<Dr2,V2,TC2,R2,P2,D2> const& rhs)
00385 {
00386   return 0 <= iterator_core_access
00387     ::distance_from(*static_cast<Dr1 const*>(&lhs),
00388                     *static_cast<Dr2 const*>(&rhs));
00389 }

00391 // Iterator difference
00392 template <class Dr1, class V1, class TC1, class R1, class P1, class D1,
00393           class Dr2, class V2, class TC2, class R2, class P2, class D2>
00394 inline __host__ __device__
00395 // XXX investigate whether we need to do extra work to determine the return type
00396 //     as Boost does
00397 typename iterator_facade<Dr1,V1,TC1,R1,P1,D1>::difference_type
00398 operator-(iterator_facade<Dr1,V1,TC1,R1,P1,D1> const& lhs,
00399           iterator_facade<Dr2,V2,TC2,R2,P2,D2> const& rhs)
00400 {
00401   return iterator_core_access
00402     ::distance_from(*static_cast<Dr1 const*>(&lhs),
00403                     *static_cast<Dr2 const*>(&rhs));
00404 }

00406 // Iterator addition
00407 template <class Derived, class V, class TC, class R, class P, class D>
00408 inline __host__ __device__
00409 Derived operator+ (iterator_facade<Derived,V,TC,R,P,D> const& i,
00410                    typename Derived::difference_type n)
00411 {
00412   Derived tmp(static_cast<Derived const&>(i));
00413   return tmp += n;
00414 }
00415 
00416 template <class Derived, class V, class TC, class R, class P, class D>
00417 inline __host__ __device__
00418 Derived operator+ (typename Derived::difference_type n,
00419                    iterator_facade<Derived,V,TC,R,P,D> const& i)
00420 {
00421   Derived tmp(static_cast<Derived const&>(i));
00422   return tmp += n;
00423 }
